name: MesoIridium™
description: Colloidal iridium - MesoIridium™ is a true iridium colloid consisting of nanoparticles of iridium. Iridium promotes improved cellular metabolism. It is believed to increase the electrical transmission across the synapses within the brain to improve memory, increase mental alertness and promote general tissue regeneration of the neurological tissues.. Concentration: 10 ppm iridium particles. Meso-Iridium is a true colloidal iridium mineral supplement and has the highest particle surface area for maximum effectiveness.
